title: Ricky Gervais leaves stage mid-show in 'heart attack' scare
text:
Comedians Ricky Gervais leaves stage mid-show in 'heart attack' scare Ricky Gervais, pictured during his hosting stint at last year's Golden Globe Awards Credit: Paul Drinkwater/NBC via AP Adam Boult 24 February 2017 â€¢ 3:50pm 
R icky Gervais left the stage for 10-minutes during his stand-up show at Bristolâ€™s Colston Hall on Wednesday - later saying on Twitter he thought he "was having a heart attack". 
The comedian was part-way through the gig when he took the unscheduled break, after which he returned to complete his set. 
He later tweeted saying: "Thanks to the amazing audience in Bristol tonight. They even laughed when I thought I was having a heart attack." 
When a follower replied asking after he health, Gervais responded that his exit from the stage "certainly wasn't part of the show." Have a peaceful night. â€” Ricky Gervais (@rickygervais) February 22, 2017
